title: Dear Riot, a LoL player
body:
I started LoL in s5, and I must admit I've like the game from then on. I was one of the stupid-crazy people that, just as I hit level 30, I jumped into rank. Not knowing all of the champions, having a very very small champion pool, didn't know proper warding, only was able to play ONE role (top) and a few more things. I undoubtedly ruined my win ratio and my rank (landed myself in bronze) :/

But let's move on. I decided that I should start fresh. Make a new account, rank with confidence, Have a higher win ratio, etc.

But here's my problem. I need runes and rune pages. I have 2 rune pages, (they're not full) I cannot afford the champions I play. How can I jump into rank without my champions? Without being able to change my runes around because I only have 2 rune pages? Without being able to afford runes on top of that..

These are the main champions I play
{{champion:72}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:35}} 

I main jungle and top [mostly jungle] and my 2nd account is already level 30. 

There's no way I'm suppose to be able to get runes, rune pages, and the champions I play. What am I to do?? Keep playing on the account daily and wait until mid-season 7 just to be able to play on it?

replies.body: What else would you expect to do? Starting over instead of just continuing to play makes almost zero sense.

At least you admitted that it was a terrible idea to just start out instead of insisting on the right to be a terrible player at that particular point in time.

There's nothing wrong with your current account, you just need to git gud if you want to climb there's nothing that will help you with a new account at gold 5 you're just going to be gold 5 with no champions/runes.

Also, I obviously dont need ALL of them. I dont need shaco, udyr, urgot and tryndamere honestly. But I need my other champs. And before anyone talk crap about me being bronze and my bronze icon and whatnot, I'm gold 4 =)
